name: International Thin-Film Solar Industry Association
goal: The objective and purpose of the Association is to strengthen global energy security and help create sustainable energy infrastructures and to promote the social, economic and environmental benefits of thin-film solar photovoltaic technologies.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Product Environmental Footprint (PEF) Initiative; Member of the Technical Secretariat of the PEF Pilot "Photovoltaic Electricity Generation"; CENELEC TC111X WG6 - Member of the sub-working group on the establishment of a minimum recycling standard for photovoltaic modules; RoHS Directive; EcoLabel; EcoDesign; Industrial Policy; Sustainable Finance; Sustainable Chemicals; EU Green Deal; Horizon Europe; Reach.
